mapper.insert: insert into rcmd_cate_tb (meet_no,cate_no) values(#{meet_no},(select cate_no from cate_tb where cate_nm=#{cate_nm}));
mapper.select: select spec_nm,t1.cate_no from spec_tb t1 left outer join cate_tb t2 on t1.cate_no=t2.cate_no where t2.cate_nm=#{cate_nm};
mapper.insert: insert into comp_spec_tb (spec_no,comp_no,spec_vl) values ((select spec_no from spec_tb where cate_no=#{cate_no} and spec_nm=#{spec_nm}), (select comp_no from comp_tb where comp_nm=#{comp_nm}),#{spec_vl});
mapper.select: select t1.meet_no,t3.cate_no from meet_tb t1 left outer join memb_tb t2 on t1.memb_no=t2.memb_no left outer join rcmd_cate_tb t3 on t1.meet_no=t3.meet_no where t2.memb_no=#{memb_no};
select t1.cate_no,cate_nm,cate_nm1,meet_no from cate_tb t1 left outer join rcmd_cate_tb t2 on t1.cate_no=t2.cate_no where t2.meet_no=#{meet_no};
